title: Kens' Artistic Side
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

This is a growing collection of art that I have created in the universe of the SCP Foundation. I will add to it as more is done.

Last updated: February 21, 2017

------
++++ Minimalist Poster Series:
+++++ **__SCPs__**
True SCPs:
[[collapsible show="+ SCP-050"]]

[[/collapsible]]

++++ Desktop wallpapers:
[*https://i.imgur.com/2Afwj.png Grey Minimalist Lines - 1680x1050]

------

++++ Misc:
[*https://imgur.com/a/60RNz#0 SCP ID Badges] (Made with the permission of those whose personalities these are based off of.)
[*https://i.imgur.com/36s4f.jpg "The Foundation" Movie Poster (v1)]
[*https://i.imgur.com/FsI0gsD.png "The Foundation" Movie Poster (v2)]
[*https://i.imgur.com/qK3sA2G.jpg "Site 19" Movie Poster]
[*https://camerapits.tumblr.com/image/74636749365 "Eldritch Application" Movie Poster]
[*https://i.imgur.com/IGswACe.jpg "The Censor" TV-show Poster]
[*https://i.imgur.com/uRuS3KJ.png "Apotheosis"] Made in appreciation of the Team Samsara MTF entries during the 2016 Contest.
[*https://i.imgur.com/aTDTMKD.png "Planetfall"] Made in appreciation of the Team Notos Blues & Jazz Band Experience MTF entries during the 2016 Contest.
[*https://i.imgur.com/g7weTtm.png "Hello World"] Made in appreciation of the Team Basic MTF entries during the 2016 Contest.
[*https://i.imgur.com/Nn7n8j5.png "Thaumiel Ale"] beer label for my homebrewed pale ale.

------

++++ Fake Magazine Covers:
[*https://i.imgur.com/dblkDHP.jpg Time Magazine Cover] - The Foundation was revealed.
[*https://i.imgur.com/XK8xf0C.jpg Newsweek Magazine Cover] - For the Broken Masquerade canon.
[*https://i.imgur.com/pbbcbt1.jpg Popular Science Magazine Cover] - For the Broken Masquerade canon.
